Long View.name: Long View
Long View.fullText:
Elf Racial Utility 2Long View

You scan the battlefield for your target. When you find it, you take aim, knowing your next shot will strike true.

Encounter
Minor Action      Personal

Effect: Choose one creature you can see. Until the end of your next turn, you gain combat advantage against that creature for any weapon attack you make using a longbow or a shortbow.


Published in Dragon Magazine 405.
Long View.flavor: You scan the battlefield for your target. When you find it, you take aim, knowing your next shot will strike true.
keywords:
Personal

Leave No Trace.name: Leave No Trace
Leave No Trace.fullText:
Elf Racial Utility 6Leave No Trace

You use instinct and training to avoid showing signs of your passage and hide all signs of your approach.

Daily      Stance
Minor Action      Personal

Effect: You assume the leave no trace stance. Until the stance ends, the DC of any Perception check to find your tracks or the tracks of up to eight allies who travel with you is increased by 10. If your tracks are found, identifying them requires a Nature check against the same DC. In addition, you and allies adjacent to you have a +2 power bonus to Stealth checks.
    This stance ends after 8 hours, when you roll initiative, or when you end this stance as a minor action.


Published in Dragon Magazine 405.
Leave No Trace.flavor: You use instinct and training to avoid showing signs of your passage and hide all signs of your approach.
Leave No Trace.effect:
You assume the leave no trace stance. Until the stance ends, the DC of any Perception check to find your tracks or the tracks of up to eight allies who travel with you is increased by 10. If your tracks are found, identifying them requires a Nature check against the same DC. In addition, you and allies adjacent to you have a +2 power bonus to Stealth checks.
    This stance ends after 8 hours, when you roll initiative, or when you end this stance as a minor action.

Determined Accuracy.name: Determined Accuracy
Determined Accuracy.fullText:
Elf Racial Utility 10Determined Accuracy

Resolved not to put a lie to the legendary accuracy of elves, you call all your powers of focus to the fore.

Daily
Free Action      Personal

Trigger: You use elven accuracy to reroll an attack and dislike the new result.

Effect: Reroll the attack roll with a +2 power bonus. Use this result, even if it’s lower.


Published in Dragon Magazine 405.
Determined Accuracy.flavor: Resolved not to put a lie to the legendary accuracy of elves, you call all your powers of focus to the fore.

Communion.name: Communion
Communion.fullText:
Elf Racial Utility 16Communion

You touch your ally and set your own heart to beat in time, unleashing the healing power of emotional connections.

Encounter      Healing
Minor Action      Melee 1

Requirement: You must have at least one healing surge remaining.

Target: One ally

Effect: You lose a healing surge but gain temporary hit points equal to 3 + one-half your level. In addition, the target regains hit points equal to his or her healing surge value.


Published in Dragon Magazine 405.
Communion.flavor: You touch your ally and set your own heart to beat in time, unleashing the healing power of emotional connections.

Elven Accuracy.name: Elven Accuracy
Elven Accuracy.sourceRef: Player's Handbook, Heroes of the Fallen Lands
Elven Accuracy.fullText:
Elf Racial PowerElven Accuracy

With an instant of focus, you take careful aim at your foe and strike with the legendary accuracy of the elves.

Encounter  
Free Action      Personal

Trigger: You make an attack roll and dislike the result.

Effect: Reroll the attack roll. Use the second roll, even if it’s lower.


Published in Player's Handbook, page(s) 40, Heroes of the Fallen Lands, page(s) 260.
